short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the spirit of Kungfu Panda to your browser with this lively new tab extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kungfu Panda New Tab is a new browser extension that brings the fun and energy of the movie "Kungfu Panda" to your web browsing experience. With images of Po and your favorite characters from the movie, you'll have a lively new tab page every time you open your browser.
